text:
There is 2 web servers running http://www.brunet.bn simultanuoesly. This
morning, when try to browse http://www.brunet.bn, it display the previous(old)
web site. The updated website back to normal, after restarted the apache service
on both web servers. 

The old web site content resides to different directory inside the web servers.
The update web site content are appointed correctly at httpd.conf. 

The web server is running Apache v2.0.55, together with php 4.4.0.
creator: testaccount@brunet.bn
jorton@redhat.com
text:
This is most likely to be a configuration issue.  Please try the user list for
help: http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html
